intel.title: Lead Qualification Strategy
intel.summary: 486 Product leads ready for qualification via Grunt swipe app. Focus on ICP fit: mid-market companies with complex data challenges.

details.approach: Use Grunt swipe app for rapid lead qualification. Prioritize companies showing intent signals.

intel.title: $17B FEMA Aid Held Up - States Scrambling
intel.summary: States facing delays, denials, cancellations of federal disaster funds. Budget pressures mounting.

keyFacts: $17 billion in FEMA aid to states currently held up
States facing delays, denials, or cancellations
New Mexico added $30M to contingency fund
details.sosOpportunity: States need to own their disaster coordination capacity. SOS sells directly to state emergency management.

intel.title: FEMA Being Gutted - States On Their Own
intel.summary: Trump admin cutting CORE staff (40% of FEMA workforce). States need alternatives.

keyFacts: 50+ CORE workers terminated on New Year's Eve
GAO: Agency already 35% below target staffing
details.sosOpportunity: FEMA becoming unreliable. SOS positioning: Community-first coordination that works WITH states.

intel.title: Palantir at $970M Federal Contracts
intel.summary: Palantir doubled federal contracts in 2025. Surveillance play vs SOS coordination play.

keyFacts: Federal contracts nearly doubled to $970.5M in 2025
ICE alone: $200M+ for Investigative Case Management
details.sosDifferentiation: Palantir = surveillance. SOS = coordination. Different buyers, different values.

intel.title: Emergency Management Market: $1.1T+
intel.summary: Homeland Security & Emergency Management market at $1.1 trillion by 2030.

intel.title: Slack Integration Architecture Mapped
intel.summary: Custom workflow steps via Bolt JS for SOS integration.

intel.title: 25 Grant Opportunities Identified
intel.summary: Comprehensive grant research complete. Top 5: Hilton Foundation, FEMA EMPG, Google.org, Bezos AI Challenge, EDA Disaster Supplemental.

priorityGrants: Hilton Foundation - Disaster Relief & Recovery (9/10 fit)
Bezos Earth Fund AI Challenge (8/10 fit)
EDA Disaster Supplemental (8/10 fit, March 2026 deadline)

intel.title: WebEOC Dissatisfaction Creates Opening
intel.summary: Emergency managers frustrated with WebEOC cost and complexity. Reddit: 'expensive and slow compared to Veoci'.

details.sosOpportunity: Position as modern, affordable WebEOC alternative with community coordination features.

intel.title: Google Crisis Response = Awareness, Not Coordination
intel.summary: Google provides consumer alerts (SOS, FloodHub, WeatherNext) but doesn't coordinate responders. Complementary, not competitive.

details.sosOpportunity: Integrate Google alerts as input; SOS provides coordination layer

intel.title: EM Software Market Growing 11% CAGR
intel.summary: Emergency Management Software market: $408M (2025) → $964M (2033). Crisis Management: $9.79B → $13.96B.

intel.title: SOS Addressable Market: $87M-$450M ARR
intel.summary: Conservative TAM $87M ARR across state/county/municipal EMAs + NGOs. Initial target: $5M ARR (10 states).

intel.title: Community Coordination = Blue Ocean
intel.summary: No competitor serves community-agency coordination well. All focus agency-to-agency. Major differentiation opportunity.

details.sosOpportunity: Bridge communities/volunteers with official emergency management. No one does this well.

intel.title: AI Recommendations for Product Roadmap
intel.summary: Key features to prioritize: AI matching (core), Slack integration (adoption), community-agency bridge (differentiation).

intel.title: RevOps Consulting Positioning
intel.summary: Harmony Strategy differentiates through AI-augmented consulting. Lower overhead with Henry assistance = higher margins.

details.approach: Position as boutique GTM consulting with AI-powered research and execution support.

intel.title: Command Center Architecture
intel.summary: Static site hosted on GitHub Pages. Data-driven via JSON files. No backend needed = zero hosting costs.

keyFacts: JSON data files for easy updates
details.approach: Keep it simple. Update JSON files to add data. GitHub Actions can automate data syncs.

intel.title: API Cost Analysis
intel.summary: Monthly API costs averaging ~$300-400. Anthropic Claude as primary model. Prompt caching significantly reduces costs.

keyFacts: Cache hits save ~90% on repeated context
details.approach: Monitor costs daily. Optimize prompts. Use caching aggressively.

aiRecommendations.rationale: Perfect mission alignment (9/10 fit). Explicitly funds 'innovations that strengthen disaster response'. Rolling deadline means no waiting.
Added $30M contingency fund specifically due to FEMA uncertainty. Early adopter mindset. Perfect timing.

aiRecommendations.recommendation: Build AI matching as core feature
aiRecommendations.rationale: Every major funder (Bezos, Google, Schmidt) prioritizing AI for climate/disaster. Table stakes for credibility.
Can't win against Palantir on their turf. WebEOC users are frustrated and accessible. Different buyer profile.
Google provides awareness, SOS provides coordination. Complementary. Google.org already funds this space.
